revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = <!-- tagline --> |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.globalscaletechnologies.com/t-openrdudetails.aspx |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = GlobalScale |model = OpenRD |submodelappend = yes |submodel = Ultimate |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88F6281; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = v5 (Kirkwood) |cpu1spd = 1.2 GHz <!-- 800 MHz / 1.0 / 1.2 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = SK hynix;HY27UF084G2M; |flash1size = 512 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Elpida;E1108ACBG-8E-E; |ram1_num = 4 |ram2type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram2type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram2spd = <!-- 3400,3333,3300,3200,3100,3000,2800,2666,2600,2400,2133,2000,1866,1600,1066,1333,800 --> |ram2size = 64 |ram2chip = ProMOS;V59C1512164QCF3; |ram2_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1116R; |eth3chip = Marvell;88E1116R; |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:50:43
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.4;Marvell 3.4.16; |stockos = Linux;2.6.22.18;;
|exp_if_types = PCIe x1, USB 2.0, SATA II, eSATA, SDHC, |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 7 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = 1 |exp_esata_num = 1 |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 10-14 |pwr_amp_dc = 5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, USB Female Mini-B,, (115200 8N1), |jtag = yes,, 20-pin header,, populated,, CON25
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = VGA out, 3.5mm audio output, Audio in (3.5mm), RS232, RS485, SMBUS, SPI, |addchip = 7-Port USB 2.0 Hub Controller;SMSC;USB2517-JZX;;1;,,, VGA Display Adapter;XGI;Volari Z11;;1;,,, Low Power Stereo Codec;Cirrus Logic;CS42L51;;1;,,, RS-232 Line Driver;Texas Instruments;MAX3221;;1;,,, Dual USB to Serial UART;FTDI;FT2232D;;1;,,, 3.3V 20Mbps RS485/RS422 Transceiver;Linear Tech;LTC2852;;1;,,, I2C Bus Repeater;NXP;PA9515A;;1;,,, 1K Microwire Compatible Serial EEPROM;Microchip;93LC46B;;1;,,, Dual SPDT Bi-Directional Analog Switch;Fairchild;FSA2257;;1;,,, Quad 3-State Noninverting Buffer;ON Semiconductor;MC74HC125A;;1;,,, 1MHz Dual Step-down Regulator;Marvell;88PG8227;;1;,,, 1MHz, 7.5A Peak Current-Limit Step-Down Regulator;Marvell;88PG877;;1;,,, 12V, 4.5A 500kHz Step-Down Regulator;Marvell;88PH845;;3;,,, 30V P-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild;NDT452AP;;1;,,, High efficiency ultrafast diode;STMicro;STTH802;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Debian, Arch Linux (Arm),
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== * Select either VGA port or PCIe slot before powering on * Select either audio interface or TDM slot by two wiring jumpers
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Marvell]]'' 886281 @ 1.2GHz *Video: XGI Volari Z11 VGA w/64MB RAM *Memory: 512MB *Storage: 512MB NAND, SDHC Card, SATA II, eSATA *Network 2x 10/100/1000 Ethernet *Ports: PCIe x1 *USB: 7x USB 2.0 *Power Source: 12V/5A via DC power
==Links of Interest== ===Third party firmware=== *[http://www.cyrius.com/debian/kirkwood/openrd/install/ ''Debian installer for OpenRD''] *[https://archlinuxarm.org/platforms/armv5/openrd ''archlinux|ARM OpenRD'']
[[Category:English Documentation]]
